name: ✦SUNKEN✦
description:
✦SUNKEN✦

Hello! This is my game about a small world where a robot becomes stuck undergound with other fellow robots - but turns out, they're not as friendly as they seem. Dodge spikes and destroy enemies in order to "win" the game! 

✧ Use arrow keys or WASD to move!

✧ Press C to shoot trashbags

✧ Collect snails in order to heal!
